==Japanese==
{{ja-kanjitab|あら|て|yomi=k}}

===Etymology===
Compound of {{compound|lang=ja|sort=あらて|新|tr1=ara|t1=new|pos1=root stem of adjective {{m|ja|新た}} ''arata'', “new”; cognate with obsolete verb {{m|ja|生る}} ''aru'', “to appear, to become manifest”|手|tr2=te|t2=hand; -er, someone who does something}}.  Compare the {{etyl|en|-}} expressions {{m|en|new hand}}, {{m|en|old hand}}.

{{ja-pron|yomi=k|あらて|acc=0|acc_ref=DJR}}

# a [[new]] [[method]], a new [[way]] of doing something
